CUSTOMER_ID,NAME,PHONE_NUMBER,ADDRESS_LINE1,ADDRESS_LINE2,CITY,STATE,COUNTRY,PINCODE,AGE,GENDER,INCOME,EXPENDITURE,CREDIT_SCORE,CURRENT_LOAN_AMOUNT,CURRENT_EMI_AMOUNT,REQUESTED_LOAN_AMOUNT,REQUESTED_EMI_AMOUNT,LOAN_APPROVAL,IS_LEGIT from SH.BANK_CUSTOMER_LOANS"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.JDBCComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","dataSourceLogicalName":"","executionOption":"","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"enableTrim":"N","easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"isAutoRepartition":"N","databaseName":"","failComponentWhenDatasetEmpty":"N","componentId":3,"componentName":"Teradata","tableName":"Teradata","category":"Source","componentType":"JDBC","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"Teradata","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[],"options":{"dbTable":"select gender,requested_emi_amount,phone_number,customer_address,expenditure,age,name,customer_id,credit_rating,current_loan_amount,is_legit,loan_approval,income,current_emi_amount,requested_loan_amount from tduser.bank_customer_loans"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.JDBCComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","dataSourceLogicalName":"","executionOption":"","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"componentId":4,"componentName":"SQL 4","tableName":"SQL_4","category":"Processor","componentType":"SQL","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[1],"options":{"dbTable":"SELECT
    customer_id,
    name,
    phone_number,
    age,
    gender,
    income,
    expenditure,
    current_loan_amount,
    current_emi_amount,
    requested_loan_amount,
    requested_emi_amount,

    CASE
        WHEN loan_approval = 1 THEN 'Approved'
        ELSE 'Rejected'
    END AS loan_approval_status,
    
    case
        when IS_LEGIT=1 then 'Legit'
        when IS_LEGIT=0 then 'Fraud'
    end as is_legit,

    -- credit_score_rating
    CASE
        WHEN credit_score < 580 THEN 'Poor'
        WHEN credit_score < 670 THEN 'Fair'
        WHEN credit_score < 740 THEN 'Good'
        WHEN credit_score < 800 THEN 'Very Good'
        ELSE 'Excellent'
    END AS credit_score_rating,

    -- combine address fields
    CONCAT_WS(
        ', ',
        address_line1,
        address_line2,
        city,
        state,
        country,
        CAST(pincode AS STRING)
    ) AS customer_address
    
    

FROM Oracle
"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.SQLComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"sourceDataFrame":"Teradata","targetDataFrame":"SQL_4","mapping":[{"sourceColumn":"gender","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"gender","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"requested_emi_amount","sourceType":"decimal(15,2)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(15,2)","targetColumn":"requested_emi_amount","targetType":"decimal(18,2)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(18,2)","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"phone_number","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"phone_number","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"customer_address","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"customer_address","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"expenditure","sourceType":"decimal(15,2)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(15,2)","targetColumn":"expenditure","targetType":"decimal(18,2)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(18,2)","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit
